postAttachCommand.test: dotnet test --no-build --verbosity normal && python -m pytest && ./mvnw -B -Pbug-check -Pcompile-jdk${{ matrix.java-versions }} test --file pom.xml && npm test

postStartCommand: dotnet restore && pip install -r requirements.txt && ./mvnw install && npm install

tasks.test: dotnet test --no-build --verbosity normal && python -m pytest && ./mvnw -B -Pbug-check -Pcompile-jdk17 test --file java/pom.xml && npm test
tasks.build: dotnet restore && dotnet build --no-restore && pip install -r requirements.txt && ./mvnw -B package --file java/pom.xml && npm install && npm run build
